title: Two teens shot while playing with gun in Eastpointe
content:
Autoplay:Two teens shot while playing with gun in EastpointeCONNECTING...
EASTPOINTE, Mich. (WXYZ) - Eastpointe police say two teens accidentally shot themselves while playing with a gun on Thursday afternoon.
According to police, the teens were inside a house on Hayes when the gun accidentally discharged.
They were taken to the hospital in serious condition, but the injuries are non-life threatening.
Police say they are investigating. It's not clear who owned the gun, or if there will be charges.
